employees.name: Erik Norgren
employees.title: CEO & Founder
employees.bio: Erik comes from a family with multiple generations of creative engineers - engineering is in his blood. He has a Masters in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Colorado, Boulder, and 15+ years' experience designing mechatronic systems from the ground up. Robotics and mechanism design are his specialties. He has a proven ability to create successful products from primitive concepts. He enjoys rock climbing and hiking in his spare time.

employees.name: Interested?
employees.title: Find out More
employees.bio: If you think you would be a good fit, I'd like to hear from you.
